turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: Seeking Technical Support for a Device or Service

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: Hi, hello. This week I want to practice on recording an internet notice in my housing and it's possible that you are my assistants, I don't know, and”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Absolutely, I'd love

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “We could to practice speaking clearly, politely in a service setting. I need, you are a housing manager or internal super staff, okay?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Got it, that sounds great! We can definitely focus on conversational practice and making sure you feel comfortable and confident. Let me know if you have any specific scenarios or topics in mind, and we can dive right in!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Yes, I report my internet is not working in my house.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: That sounds like a great

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “And I need a technician. I will leave it with you.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Absolutely, I can help with that! We can definitely go through some common phrases and scenarios you might use at home. Just let me know what kind of situations you’d like to practice, and we’ll get started!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Okay, hello, my name is Juliet. My internet is not working in my house. Could you help me, please?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Of course, Farida! I'd be happy to help. We can start with some everyday phrases and vocabulary that you might need at home. Let me know if there's a specific room or situation you want to focus on first!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Yes, when I connected in my room, my Wi-Fi is not working. Maybe it's so far to the mother, I don't know, but could you save me if there are one technician available for coming here?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Absolutely! So, for example, you could say something like, "My Wi-Fi isn't working properly. Can you help me fix it?" or "I'm having trouble with my internet connection." We can definitely practice those kinds of phrases together!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “I want to practice with me. I don't want to correct, I don't know, my mistake.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: No worries at all! We can practice step-by-step, and I'll guide you through the phrases and vocabulary. Just let me know whenever you're ready, and we'll work on it together, nice and easy!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Hi, my internet has stopped working.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Got it! We can definitely practice how to express that. For example, you could say, "My Wi-Fi isn't working at the moment," or "I'm having internet issues." Let me know if you want to try one of those out, and we can refine it together!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “There's no signal in my apartment.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Oh, I see! So you can say something like, "There’s no signal in my apartment," or "I’m not getting any connection in my apartment." We can practice that and make sure it feels natural for you!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Yes, could you practice like a conversation? I don't want that you correct my mistake.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Absolutely, I understand! We'll keep it natural and just have a smooth conversation, and I’ll support you along the way. Whenever you're ready,

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Sí, eres un gerente, un gerente de vivienda, por favor.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Sure, I can definitely do that! So, as a housing manager, I’ll help you with any concerns or questions you have about your apartment. Just let me know what you’d like to discuss, and we’ll go from there!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Yes, there's no signal in my apartment. My internet has stopped working.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: I’m sorry to hear that. Let’s see how we can fix it. Could you tell me if you’ve tried rebooting your router, or if there have been any recent changes in your building’s network?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Maybe the internet is so far the modern to my room, because in the living room the signal is better than my room.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Got it, that definitely makes sense. In that case, we might want to consider repositioning your router or maybe using a Wi-Fi extender. Let me know if you’d like some tips on that, or if there’s anything else I can help with.

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Can you check if there's an outage in the area, maybe?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Of course, I can definitely look into that for you. Let me check if there are any outages reported in your area, and I’ll let you know what I find.

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Yeah and it's possible that maybe call a technician a availability for check my internet and my Wi-Fi.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Absolutely, we can arrange that. I’ll check the technician availability and find a suitable time for them to come by and take a look at everything. Just let me know what times work best for you, and we’ll make it happen!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Okay, what shall I try before you send someone?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: That’s a great question! Usually, we can look at weekday afternoons or early evenings. Let me know if there’s a specific day or time that works best for you, and we’ll find the perfect slot!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “I will lie tomorrow and any time. I don't mind.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Perfect, that works out well! I’ll go ahead and arrange for a technician to come tomorrow at a time that’s convenient for you. And if anything changes, just let me know!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Yes, please. I'll call to my work to say that the technician comes here tomorrow. If the service isn't fixed tomorrow, maybe you know if the company gets a refund or credit.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Absolutely, that sounds like a good plan. Usually, the company can send someone pretty quickly, and I’ll make sure to confirm the details for you. Just let me know if you need any extra help, and we’ll get everything sorted out!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Okay, if the technician doesn't fix my internet, is it possible to change to a different service plan?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Yes, absolutely! If the technician finds that a different service provider would be more reliable, we can definitely discuss that option and arrange for a switch if needed. We’ll make sure you get the best possible connection!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Could you repeat more slowly, please?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Of course, I’ll slow down. Absolutely, if the technician determines that a different service provider would be better for your internet, we can definitely talk about switching providers. We’ll make sure that you have the best possible connection. Let me know if you have any other questions.

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “No, I don't have more questions. Thank you so much.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: You’re very welcome! I’m glad I could help. If anything else comes up, just let me know. Have a great day!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “You too.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Thank you so much! Take care, and feel free to reach out anytime. Goodbye for now!
